name: k6-graphql
description: Scalable and modular k6 GraphQL load testing framework with SOLID principles

scripts.test:smoke: npm run bundle:smoke && k6 run dist/countries-smoke-test.bundle.js
scripts.test:load: npm run bundle:load && k6 run dist/countries-load-test.bundle.js
scripts.test:stress: npm run bundle:stress && k6 run dist/countries-stress-test.bundle.js
scripts.test:spike: npm run bundle:spike && k6 run dist/countries-spike-test.bundle.js
scripts.test:smoke:debug: npm run bundle:smoke && k6 run --env DEBUG=true dist/countries-smoke-test.bundle.js
